attributes.background: Since 2007 the amount of rhinos being poached has increased by 9,000%. This is because many people want the horns of rhinos and rhinos can't live without their horns. The only reason why they kill rhinos is for the money. This should stop because we need rhinos and they definitely do matter!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
